attributes.action: Hold a general election in 2008 before The Labour Party destroy the economy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The electorate must be given a general election as a matter of urgency because the Labour party's borrowing is out of control and the country is getting deeper and deeper into debt.  The only way to stop this reckless borrowing is to vote Labour out and elect a new Conservative Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
